text: The Freshman is a 1990 American crime comedy film. Andrew Bergman wrote and directed the film. The film stars Marlon Brando, Matthew Broderick, Bruno Kirby, Penelope Ann Miller, and Frank Whaley. The film is about New York film student and how he enters a illegal business. The business focuses on exotic animals to serve as food. He has to get a Komodo Dragon. The film got positive reviews. It has a 94% on Rotten Tomatoes. ==References== Category:1990 crime movies Category:1990 comedy movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:American parody movies Category:American satirical movies Category:Movies composed by David Newman Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: The Freshman (1990 movie)
